property_description:
Feels Bright and Comfortable

This 2-bedroom, 1-bath condo on the 3rd floor has a nice, bright living room where you’ll probably spend most of your time. There’s a large window that floods the space with natural light, making the light wood floors and neutral walls feel really warm and inviting. The modern blue sofa and black-and-white patterned rug give the room a nice contemporary touch without feeling overdone.

Practical and Relaxed Layout

The dining area fits a glass-top table for two, perfect if you like casual meals or working from home. You’ve got wall shelves with small plants and an artificial flower arrangement that add some personality without taking up space.

Bedrooms and Extras

Both bedrooms come with beds (one in blue bedding and one pink), a flat screen TV, and good-sized windows, so the natural light extends here, too. The balcony on this upper floor is a great spot to unwind, plus the pool area outside is surrounded by landscaped greenery, offering a nice, peaceful vibe.

It’s freehold, resale condition, and priced at just under 3 million THB — a solid choice if you want something comfortable and move-in ready in Nong Prue.

property_title: One Bedroom Condo with Balcony in Seven Seas Condo Resort, Jomtien
property_description:
Light-filled and Practical Living

This 36.5 sqm, one-bedroom condo on the 4th floor feels surprisingly spacious thanks to its smart layout and large windows that let in plenty of natural light. The living area is probably where you’ll spend most of your time—it’s bright, with wood-look tile flooring that’s both stylish and easy to maintain, complemented by recessed ceiling lights and a comfy beige ottoman.

The kitchen keeps things modern and efficient with light wood cabinets, a built-in stovetop, and a mosaic tile backsplash that adds a touch of character without feeling busy. It’s compact but has all the essentials, including a coffee machine and kettle, perfect for quick meals or breakfast.

The bedroom fits a queen or king-sized bed with gray bedding, a small bedside table, and built-in wardrobe with mirrored sliding doors, which makes the space feel bigger. The bathroom feels fresh and modern too, with a walk-in shower featuring both overhead rain and handheld showerheads.The balcony, accessible through sliding glass doors, offers outdoor seating with nice views of greenery and surrounding buildings. It’s a great spot to enjoy morning coffee or relax in the evening.

 The building itself has a large swimming pool with a fun water slide, tropical landscaping, an indoor gym with multiple machines, and convenient commercial space including a 7-Eleven on the ground floor. Parking’s right next to the building, and the whole complex has a secure, well-kept environment with a decorative front entrance.

All things considered, this is a solid resale option if you want a comfortable, modern condo with good amenities in the Nong Prue area of Pattaya.

Compact, Bright, and Well-Designed Space

This 26 sqm condo on the 17th floor offers a smart layout that feels more spacious than you’d expect. You’ve got an open-concept studio setup, but with a sliding glass door between the living area and the bedroom, which helps keep things separate without making it feel cramped.

The living room is small but cozy, and there’s a comfy gray two-seater sofa sitting on a sharp black-and-white geometric rug—nice touch that adds some personality. The home feels secure with window bars and a gated yard, and it sits on a paved street with sidewalks, so getting around is easy.

Overall, it’s a well-maintained, comfortable home that balances indoor and outdoor living pretty well, all set within easy reach of Pattaya’s amenities. If you want a single-story setup that feels open but private, this could be worth checking out.

property_description:
What to Expect from This Place

This is a fresh, single-story villa with three bedrooms, perfectly set on a 500 sqm plot in Thap Tai, Hua Hin. The layout is straightforward and practical, so everything’s on one level, which is great if you want to avoid stairs or plan to stay long-term.

The Heart of the Home

You’ll probably spend a lot of time around the covered patio area—it’s got recessed ceiling lights and a fan, so it stays comfortable even on warm evenings. The space easily fits both a dining area with a glass table and wicker chairs plus a lounge spot with blue cushions. Sliding glass doors from the main rooms open up to this outdoor space, letting in plenty of natural light and making it easy to move between indoors and out.

Outside Highlights

  • The standout feature is the private rectangular swimming pool with clear, clean blue water, surrounded by a concrete deck and a well-kept green lawn.
  • A combination of tropical plants, shrubs, and a tall hedge offers good privacy from neighbors, along with boundary walls.
  • Wood-look tile flooring on the patio keeps the feel natural and low maintenance.

The house has a classic white exterior with a red hip tiled roof, which fits nicely in the local style. It’s offplan, so you’d be one of the first to move in. If you want a relaxed spot in a tranquil area without sacrificing conveniences, this could be worth checking out.

property_title: Modern Single-Story Pool Villa Open Living Space at Wararom Village Khao Tao
property_description:
Welcome to this cozy 3-bedroom, 2-bath villa in Wang Phong, Pran Buri.

It’s all on one floor, which makes it easy to move around, especially if you prefer avoiding stairs. The covered space is about 216 sqm, sitting on a 405 sqm plot, so there’s a nice balance between indoor comfort and outdoor space.

Living and Dining Areas

The living room and dining area flow together in an open-plan layout, giving a relaxed, airy vibe. You’ll probably spend most time here—the large window lets in plenty of natural light, softly filtered through white sheer curtains and heavier drapes for privacy when you want it.Wooden furniture and warm recessed lighting add a natural, welcoming feel.

Kitchen

The kitchen stands out with its modern black cabinetry and a practical L-shaped layout. Granite countertops and a kitchen island with seating for two mean you can prep meals while chatting or enjoying breakfast. Appliances include a built-in microwave, dishwasher, fridge-freezer, and a range hood — so it’s fully set up for everyday convenience.

Outdoor Space

Sliding glass doors open onto a balcony/patio furnished for relaxing – perfect for morning coffee or unwinding in the evening with some ambient cove lighting. Having that outdoor spot adds a quiet retreat without leaving the house.

With two garage spaces and freehold ownership, this modern resale villa offers a solid, move-in-ready option if you’re looking for something comfortable and well thought out in the Khao Tao area.

Ownership: Freehold

Asking price 7,900,000 THB

The layout is open-plan, so you’ll probably spend most of your time in the living area—it's naturally well-lit, has a gray upholstered sofa, and white walls that make the space feel bright and airy.

The kitchen is quite practical with wooden cabinets, granite countertops, and all the essentials like a gas stovetop, built-in oven, stainless steel fridge, plus a microwave and rice cooker already set up. A double sink and plenty of storage make it easy for everyday cooking.

Step outside to the covered patio—great for dining alfresco under the ceiling fan and recessed lighting when it cools down. The garden is neatly kept with greenery and potted plants, plus there’s a privacy hedge and a decorative metal gate that add a nice sense of seclusion.

property_title: Cozy 15th-Floor Studio Condo with Smart Layout and Great Light in Hua Hin, Baan Kiang Fah
property_description:
Nice, practical studio on the 15th floor

This unit’s open-concept design makes it feel surprisingly spacious for a studio. You’ve got a queen-size bed tucked in one corner, and a dark gray L-shaped sofa that practically invites you to relax in front of the flat-screen TV mounted on the wall. The large window here gets good natural light most of the day, and there are both sheer and blackout curtains so you can control it depending on your mood or schedule.

Design details that add character and storage

What stands out is the exposed brick-pattern wallpaper combined with wooden floors — it gives the place a bit of a loft feel without being over the top. There’s a built-in wardrobe with mirrored sliding doors, which is a plus when you want to keep the room feeling open. You won’t have to worry about bulky furniture because the space includes smart shelving and storage near the TV and entryway, plus a compact desk setup with two office chairs if you need a work-from-home spot.

Kitchen and dining for everyday living

The kitchen is small but functional, with a stainless steel energy-efficient fridge, a built-in countertop oven, and a single sink framed by white and light wood cabinets. Eating is comfortable at the bar-height dining table with black metal framing and three cushioned stools, or the smaller two-chair table nearby. The air conditioner keeps the whole space cool and comfortable.

If you’re looking for a freehold condo in Hua Hin that blends convenience, style, and functionality, it’s worth a look.

property_title: Sea View 2 Bedroom Condo  - Boathouse Hua Hin
property_description:
Sea View in your face! Enjoy a peaceful-relaxed lifestyle in this true sea view condo located on the 10th floor of the Boathouse Indulge the stunning panoramic sea-views of the Gulf of Thailand. The big sliding doors open wide providing magnificent sea breezes and stunning sunrises. From the moment you enter this room you see the sea and immediately experience and feel calm and cool. Spacious 120 sq. meters living space and it is a corner unit features an open floor plan with living, dining, and full kitchen with stove-top, plenty of counter space & cabinets. Features an open living / dining area & full kitchen adjacent the living areas with plenty of cabinets and counter space.
Both living dining, as well as the master bedroom enjoy the spectacular ocean view and with direct access to the U-shaped balcony from the master suite and the living room. A great place to enjoy your meals, or just relax & enjoy life with beach side breeze.

Ownership: Foreign name 

Asking price 6,500,000 THB 

Within 10 minutes or less and you arrive to the center of Hua Hin, down-town with Market Village, & Blu-Port shopping centers, with the gourmet supermarket and special select bakeries and butchers, with many 5-star hotels & resorts as well as many more restaurants. Everything from Brazilian steak house to Vietnamese cuisine, Hua Hin has something for everyone with various shops, plus 3 big night markets. For golf lovers, the Palm Hills golf & Country club is just 2 kilometers. Hua Hin has numerous golf courses, basketball and tennis courts, Kite-surfing schools and clubs plus water parks, and a variety of clubs for every activity you can think of. Aerobics to Yoga, Hua Hin has many activity centers, clubs & groups. Live the good life in Hua Hin.

Boathouse dedicated nearly 50% of the land for common grounds for all residents to enjoy the outdoor lifestyle with lush tropical gardens and wonderful swimming pools & a children’s “aqua park” a water park for the little ones and a beautiful infinity edge swimming pool on the beach. There are swimming pools, and swimming canals for you to swim and swim. State of the art fitness studio, tennis courts. private library and a restaurant all beach side.
The neighborhood, has two Thai & seafood restaurants next door and you can enjoy a short walk on the beach to the Dusit Thani resort & the Sheraton Hua Hin hotel less than 1 kilometer to enjoy spectacular 5 star dining on the beach and other restaurants, coffee shops & convenient marts. Located directly across the street, is the Palm Hills Golf & Country Club & the FN outlet & more.

Other Facilities include: 24 / 7 security and HD CCTV, mature manicured and landscaped gardens throughout the property & well-maintained roads and walkways. There is plenty of covered parking, but not much time to get your hands on this excellent sea view condo.

property_title: 4 Bedroom Beach Villa For Sale - Dolphin Bay
property_description:
Sea-side estate, with private rooftop sky-lounge & Jacuzzi. This fabulous multi-level pool villa with spectacular views of the breathtaking peaks of Sam Roi Yot and enjoy a slice of sea-view as well. The villa is set in a private estate and built on a generous seaside plot of nearly 800 sq. meters with a spacious living area. And best of all, you are just 200 meters away from the white sand beach, great for swimming & kite-surfing.
The living space is open & fresh yet offers privacy at the same time with a well laid out floor plan of the 3 levels and a modern design allowing you to enjoy the superb views. The living room itself offers floor to ceiling sliding doors that slide wide open. This not only gives you panoramic views, but incredible fresh sea breezes and natural light. 3 master suite sized bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms and floor to ceiling sliding glass doors offer you fantastic views of the tropical landscaped garden and pool and serenity with gentle sea breezes which flow through the entire villa.
This multi-level villa enjoys a large living room, spacious dining room & the kitchen with a large island and plenty of counter space and cabinets. There is a large storage and laundry room adjacent the kitchen. Continue to the 2nd floor and you have a very large family / media room and 2 bedrooms on the 2nd floor, both featuring an en-suite bathroom. Then you may continue up to the 3rd floor for the, sky-lounge, sundeck and Jacuzzi.
Other key features include; Double wide carport and storage room, landscaped gardens surrounding the villa. Within 5 to 10 minutes you have several restaurants, convenience marts and more. Hua Hin is only 30 minutes‚Äô drive and there is a Tesco Lotus and Thai fresh market just 15 minutes from the estate.

All windows are fitted with mosquito nets and the bedrooms also have dark curtains.

The 2nd floor is reached either via external or internal staircase and has 3 bedrooms with bath, TV lounge and two large balconies.

Outdoors you will find your own private saltwater pool, sitting area, outdoor shower, toilet, sunbathing area, covered carport, covered dining area and storage room.

The villa was completed in 2008 and is located in a fenced private area with a total of 16 Villas in different sizes and shapes. The area is called Baan Roth, located in Soi 112 and has mostly Scandinavian owners. There is daily maintenance of the entire area and your private garden and pool with secutiry guard night time.

The property is sold fully furnished.

Laze the day away in the gigantic, meandering wave pool. Fitness aficionados can take in breathtaking 270-degree ocean panoramas at the sky-high yoga club and zen relaxation zone, or enjoy the fully-fitted gymnasium suite. From pitch-and-putt golfing to an Onsen steam bath at the in-house massage and health spa; from soaring lobby areas with hotel-style dining and shopping facilities to the business lounge with red-carpet supercar parking, Grand Solaire Pattaya sets a new standard for absolute residential luxury, unprecedented in the Pattaya real estate arena.

property_title: Mountain & Sea View Villa In Stunning Estate - Panorama Khao Tao
property_description:
This luxury mansion is one of few sea view Villas on this size¬†located in Khao Tao, only about 1km from the beautiful beaches in the area and near national parks, restaurants, markets and shops.

The villa itself has been built according to the highest building standards and has been maintained impeccably well.

It is on a corner plot of 2046 square meters in size, and the total living area covers around 772 square meters total.

You can access the house either from the ground floor or from the stairs leading to the main living area. A lift can also easily be installed where the stairs are located.

The house is built on two levels, with the 2nd floor featuring some of the most iconic and breathtaking views you will find anywhere in Thailand. The view itself is worth the cost.

The main living area and full western, modern kitchen open up onto a large covered terrace with full outdoor gas BBQ and some simply stunning views of the surrounding mountains and the Khao Tao ocean.

The main living area has a tall, vaulted ceiling and the entire front ‚Äúwall‚Äù overlooking the outdoor area and swimming pool is glass, with sliding glass doors on either side.

There is a full toilet and shower room next to one another outside for easy access while using the pool

The original primary bedroom has been converted to a large bar and games room with en suite bathroom, but can easily be converted back to a bedroom.

All bedrooms are downstairs and they all have en suite bathrooms. Three of the 7 bedrooms are currently used for other purposes including a movie room and spa room with adjacent restrooms.

There is a large storage room / pantry and laundry room, with a utility and service room underneath the house for all electrical wiring and conduits etc. as the house is built right up on the mountainside.

The home also features a fully equipped home gym, with large, lush tropical garden.

The property also features a high end generator in the carport.

This is a one in a million luxury estate that is perfect for a family or for a rental investment.

Additional property features:

‚Äì Full FREEHOLD Chanot land.
‚Äì Common area maintenance annual fees are 39,404THB (about 3,3000THB per month) ‚Äì Paid 6 months in advance.
‚Äì Private garden and pool annual maintenance services cost 83,780THB so roughly 7,000THB per month.

property_description:
Ownership: FREEHOLD / LEASEHOLD

A perfect family home with a great size plot that gives you option to extend easily. This single level pool villa offers privacy as its corner plot and also features large lawn, pool, and sunbathing area. The villa has in total 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, an open plan area incorporates with lounge, well equipped kitchen, and dining area. 

The villa is sold furnished and ready to move in.

Welcome to Orchid Paradise Homes, the lovely villa project set a midst stunning mountains close to Hua Hin city center. Our private resort-homes combine leisure, investment and vacation in perfect harmony; here permanent residents and holidaymakers live together as neighbors surrounded by lush tropical nature less than 15 minutes from Hua Hin city center and beautiful beaches.

Orchid Paradise Homes has something for everyone; those who wish to enjoy the privacy and tranquility in their own spacious garden and large swimming pool or others who prefer a more lively atmosphere in the common area / club house with BBQ, swimming pool with water slide, restaurant and bar. Orchid Paradise Homes has always room for children, and families with kids will enjoy the fun and friendly surroundings. If golf is your favourite pastime, Hua Hin sports more than 10 golf courses and Orchid Paradise Homes is located just 5 kilometers from the internationally renown Black Mountain golf course and Water Park. Here you also have the opportunity to try water skiing and wakeboarding in the brand new cable park.

property_title: OUTSTANDING FAMILY RESIDENCE IN BANG SARAY (2km from the Silver Lake)
property_description:
This well-maintained resort-style estate is comprised of three houses on a spacious 1200 sqm land plot.¬† A 42 sqm salt-water swimming pool with a spacious pool terrace of 30 sqm is situated in a lush tropical garden.

One of the buildings offers a guest room with an en-suite bathroom, a storage room, a laundry room a workshop and a utility area. A double garage and a roofed carport keep your vehicles protected from sun and rain.

he main house offers a large living and dining area which opens to an open, modern European Kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, oven, microwave and three refrigerators. Two large bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and a guest bathroom complement the main house. All rooms incl. the kitchen are furnished with modern, high-quality furniture, appliances and air conditioning. The third house on the premises sports two additional air-conditioned bedrooms, an outdoor bathroom with shower and a spacious 80 sqm open-living / entertainment- ment lounge, complete with an open kitchen and furnished dining area as well as lounge furniture, sun beds, and an 85-inch TV. All three houses are embedded in a lush, well-maintained tropical garden. Two of the buildings have been constructed in 2012 and have been thoroughly renovated in 2019. Both are constructed with double walls and roof insulation. The construction of the third house was finished in July 2022. The premises are surrounded by a 2 to 3 m high wall with two electric- and one manual gate. The estate is situated in a quiet neighborhood, with well-known landmarks as Silver Lake, Buddha Mountain and the first-class Khao Chee Chan Golf Resort, as well as the Ramayana Water Park and Nong Nooch Tropical Garden. If you enjoy fine dining, the elegant Castello di Bellagio Restaurant is just 5 minutes away from your home. Bang Saray and Sattahip with their beaches, shops, supermarkets, markets, restaurants and entertainment are nearby for all those who enjoy the buzzing live in the city.

The entire estate is sold fully furnished for 17,900,000 THB.
